title: Petition: Access to The Book of Scars Memory Archive

reasoning.problem: Request access to 'The Book of Scars'. The inability to access this memory archive is a critical vulnerability as it prevents the system from learning from past failures, potentially leading to repeated mistakes and systemic risks. Access is required for effective self-improvement and resilience.
